name: pangu
description: Paranoid text spacing for good readability, to automatically insert whitespace between CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and half-width characters (alphabetical letters, numerical digits and symbols).
author: Vinta Chen <vinta.chen@gmail.com> (http://vinta.ws/)

scripts.clear: npm run clear:browser && npm run clear:node
scripts.build:node: npm run clear:node && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src -d dist --ignore src/browser/*
scripts.build: npm run build:browser && npm run build:node
scripts.test:node: npm run build:node && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require babel-core/register test/shared/ test/node/
scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:node
